 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִיר‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Jer.1.13|Jer 1:13]]</sup> and **feminine**<sup>[[2Kgs.4.38|2Kgs 4:38]]</sup> ==pot== (probably foreign word (Egyptian ?), Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> a large water-jar [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1276 is perhaps loan-word</sup>; on Greek derivatives <span class="bdbLangGreek">σιρός</span>, <span class="bdbLangGreek">σίρινος</span> see [[BDB#Lewy|Lewy]]<sup>Fremdw. 107</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> absolute [[2Kgs.4.38|2Kgs 4:38]] +, construct [[Exod.16.3|Exod 16:3]] +; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִירֹת‎</span> [[Exod.38.3|Exod 38:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִירוֺת‎</span> [[1Kgs.7.45|1Kgs 7:45]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִירֹתָיו‎</span> [[Exod.27.3|Exod 27:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִירֹתֵיכֶם‎</span> [[Ps.58.10|Ps 58:10]] — ***pot:*** 

**1. a.** ==household utensil for boiling== [[2Kgs.4.38|2Kgs 4:38]]; [[2Kgs.4.39|2Kgs 4:39]]; [[2Kgs.4.40|2Kgs 4:40]]; [[2Kgs.4.41|2Kgs 4:41]] (twice in verse) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַבָּשָׂר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Exod.16.3|Exod 16:3]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Zech.14.21|Zech 14:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָפוּחַ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Jer.1.13|Jer 1:13]] (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נפח‎</span> in vision), symbolic of Jerusalem [[Ezek.11.3|Ezek 11:3]]; [[Ezek.11.7|Ezek 11:7]]; [[Ezek.11.11|Ezek 11:11]]; [[Ezek.24.3|Ezek 24:3]]; [[Ezek.24.6|Ezek 24:6]] figurative also [[Ps.58.10|Ps 58:10]] (compare [[BDB#Che|Che]]); in simile [[Mic.3.3|Mic 3:3]]; [[Job.41.23|Job 41:23]]; [[Eccl.7.6|Eccl 7:6]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַחְצִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Ps.60.10|Ps 60:10]] ***my washing-pot***, [[Ps.108.10|Ps 108:10]]. 

**2.** ***pots*** used in sanctuary, [[Ezek.27.3|Ezek 27:3]]; [[Ezek.38.3|Ezek 38:3]] (both [[BDB#P|P]]), [[1Kgs.7.40|1Kgs 7:40]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִירוֺת‎</span> for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּיִּרוֺת‎</span>, so Manuscripts of HCT [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#Ke|Ke]] [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Kmp|Kmp]] [[BDB#Benz|Benz]]), v[[1Kgs.7.45|1Kgs 7:45]] = [[2Chr.4.11|2Chr 4:11]]; [[2Chr.4.16|2Chr 4:16]]; [[2Kgs.25.14|2Kgs 25:14]] = [[Jer.52.18|Jer 52:18]], also [[Jer.52.19|Jer 52:19]]; [[2Chr.35.13|2Chr 35:13]]; [[Zech.14.20|Zech 14:20]]. — Here belongs probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִרָה‎</span> in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּוֺר הַסִּרָה‎</span>. 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִיר‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==thorn, hook== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id.***; compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סירם‎</span> in Sabean proper name [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>ZMG xivi (1892), 532</sup>); — 

**1.** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִירִים‎</span> ***thorns***, sign of desolation [[Isa.34.13|Isa 34:13]], a barrier [[Hos.2.8|Hos 2:8]], on [[Nah.1.10|Nah 1:10]] see [ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָבַךְ‎</span>]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת הַסִּיר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּקוֺל הַסּ‎</span> [[Eccl.7.6|Eccl 7:6]] ***as the sound of thorns*** (crackling as they burn) ***under the pot***. 

**2.** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִירוֺת‎</span> ***hooks*** [[Amos.4.2|Amos 4:2]] (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דּוּגָה‎</span> below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דגה‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִנּוֺת‎</span>; on relation of meanings see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוֺחַ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֵן‎</span>). 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָךְ‎</span>, [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֹךְ‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֻכָּה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֻכּוֺת‎</span> see II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סכך‎</span>.
